description.displayText: Robin is extremely attentive and careful. She has worked as a part-time PA for my family for over a year and has helped with a variety of tasks, from running errands to grocery shopping to cooking to organizing closets. She has made my life much exponentially easier and is exceptionally trustworthy. I would highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Robin is extremely attentive and careful. She has worked as a part-time PA for my family for over a year and has helped with a variety of tasks, from running errands to grocery shopping to cooking to organizing closets. She has made my life much exponentially easier and is exceptionally trustworthy. I would highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Robin is a dream. She is smart, friendly, detail-oriented, and incredibly responsible. She is currently our housekeeper, but is a chef, as well. When she walks in, she immediately assesses what most needs to be done that day, including attacking closets or dusting in places I always ignore. I really feel like she is a partner to me in keeping my home working smoothly. I'm grateful and couldn't say enough to demonstrate how confident I am in her.

description.displayText: Robin and I worked in the same company and she provided the meals for us. I saw that Robin was always very hardworking and had the intention of doing an excellent job. During the time that she provided the meals there were no complaints about the food. She prepared nutritious and varied meals. On a personal level Robin was always friendly and willing to help.

description.displayText: Robin works hard. Her attention to detail is out standing. There never were any issues in the time she worked for me.
